text: vahee hai jisane tumhen akelee jaan paida kiya aur usee kee jaati se usaka joda banaaya, taaki usakee or pravrtt hokar shaanti aur chain praapt kare. phir jab usane usako dhaank liya to usane ek halka-sa bojh utha liya; phir vah use lie hue chalatee-phiratee rahee, phir jab vah bojhil ho gaee to donon ne allaah - apane rab ko pukaara, "yadi toone hamen bhala-changa bachcha diya, to nishchay hee ham tere krtagy honge.
